item.title: Windows 必备工具
item.description: 好用的工具 Listary: https://www.listarypro.com/ PotPlayer: https://daumpotplayer.com/download/ Microsoft PowerToys: https://docs.microsoft.com/zh-cn/windows/powertoys/ VsCode: https://code.visualstudio.com/docs QuickLook: https://github.com/QL-Win/QuickLook Windows Terminal: 通过 Windows 应用商店安装 Deskreen: 将电脑屏幕共享到浏览器中，做第二块屏幕[Win/macOS/Linux] https://github.com/pavlobu/deskreen Deskflow: 一套键鼠
